comments.comment:
Thanks for your reply, I follow your suggestion, before install asteroid, it should first install NumPy and Cython. <denchmark-code>$ conda create -n asteroid python=3.8 $ conda activate asteroid $ pip install numpy $ pip install Cython $ pip install asteroid </denchmark-code>
solved, I will close it.
